function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Tourists consuming foreign or exotic foods may be blamed for disease transmission, leading to social risk.","Impact":"Stigmatization and exclusion of tourists, potential spread of disease.","Mitigation":"Education on food safety and hygiene, cultural sensitivity training, and promotion of open communication.","Technologies":"Informational apps, translation tools, and virtual reality simulations.","People":"Tourists, local residents, and public health officials.","Owner":"Tourism industry, government authorities, and public health organizations."},{"Description":"Biased risk perceptions of COVID-19, with individuals perceiving their own risk as lower than others.","Impact":"Complacency, underestimation of personal risk, and potential risky behavior.","Mitigation":"Public health education, community engagement, and behavioral nudges to increase awareness.","Technologies":"Smartphone apps for risk assessment, social media campaigns, and telehealth services.","People":"Tourists, local communities, and public health authorities.","Owner":"Public health agencies, tour operators, and technology companies."},{"Description":"Differences in risk perceptions based on demographic characteristics, cultural background, and socio-psychological features.","Impact":"Variation in response to risk, potential for misunderstandings, and unequal distribution of protective measures.","Mitigation":"Tailored risk communication, cultural sensitivity training, and equitable access to resources and support.","Technologies":"Multilingual communication tools, virtual reality training modules, and data analytics for personalized risk assessments.","People":"Tourists of different demographics, local communities, and policymakers.","Owner":"Travel industry, cultural organizations, and government agencies."}]}
